column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
EC2- increased number of instances total 6 and change to t3.xlarge for the Web servers
EC2- increased number of instances total 6 and change to m5.2xlarge for the Application servers
RDS - increased number of instances from 1 to 2 and change to db.m5.4xlarge. One master per availability zone
Application Load Balancer - increased number of processed GB per month (EC2 and IP)
Network Load Balancer - increased number of processed GB per month (NLB for TCP)
